name: David Ifeoluwa Adelani, Assistant Professor
university: McGill School of Computer Science, Canada
research: My research focuses on multilingual NLP and Speech processing especially for low-resource languages. My PhD focused on NLP for African languages but now I am expanding to various regions of the world including South Asia, South-East Asia and Americas indigeneous languages.
prospective_students: Previously, I was a DeepMind Academic Fellow at UCL, and I obtained a PhD in Computer Science at Saarland University. I will be recruiting MSc/PhD students for fall 2025, if you are interested, please apply through MILA’s request for supervision (deadline December 1, 2024).
